blogs.title: Slow writing day
blogs.summary: This has been a day of procrastination. I did manage to finish the first chapter of Meta-programming in R and put it on Leanpub. You can get it there for free for now; when I finish the next chapter I will put the price at $0.99 + VAT, so get it fast if yo

blogs.title: Received Beginning Data Science in R
blogs.summary: Well, I finally got it. Ten copies of Beginning Data Science in R. I’ve already given a few away to colleagues and students, but the few left look great on my shelf.
